name: AIspionage
description:
This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 (#4).

The theme was: rewind.

Controls:

Advance the game: Space

Rewind (undo): U

Restart: R

Toggle "Debug" Mode (Seeing the AI grades): I

Move: WASD

You sent a robot to steal some documents from a secure facility. But you discovered that you cannot connect to him while he is there, so you developed an AI to guide him to the documents. However, after some time you discover the AI is faulty and use your ability to rewind time back and redo a choice to guide him towards the files.

Credits:

Art and programming by me.

Music by Matthew Pablo, https://matthewpablo.com.

Menu Music by nene.

Siren sound by aquinn.

Screaming sound from https://zapslat.com.

VHS Rewind sound by MrAuralization.
